content: {"locationId": "8589", "organizationId": "7087", "name": "Battle Ground Adventist Community Services", "address1": "11117 NE 189th St", "address2": "", "city": "Battle Ground", "state": "WA", "zipCode": "98604", "country": null, "phone": "360-687-3459", "phoneExt": "", "website": "http://www.battlegroundfoodbank.org", "latitude": "45.758508", "longitude": "-122.5580638", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "We are located in the rear of the Centerpoint building at 11117 NE 189th St.  There is a driveway going down and behind the building.  If our parking lot is full, please park in the upper parking lot.", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "360-687-3459", "contactEmail": "bgacsfood@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "Clothing Distribution", "foodServiceTypes": "Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, Shopping Style / Client Choice", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Diapers", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 62, "regionName": "Clark County Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "9bf000f5-bac8-4ee4-940a-e34b2fd8f20d.png", "website": "https://www.clarkcountyfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Pacific Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "PT", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Tuesday 1:00 PM-5:30 PM", "Tuesday 1:00 PM-5:30 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
